content:
Hi Everyone

I work for an Occupational Health firm in the UK. We're currently investigating and scoping a Health Dashboard / booking system that we'd like to meet the FHIR specification. It's early days and I am currently pulling in the necessary resources to build a team to implement the application.

I have become familiar with some of the FHIR specification and have Firely server running locally, but I am quickly realising that having someone to consult with / discuss architecture options with would be hugely beneficial. This may well be a full time role / long term contract basis.

If this is of interest to anyone here, or if there is somewhere in particular that I should post this then let me know!

Thanks
Please send job posts to @Grahame Grieve. He will post them on the #work opportunities stream.
well, look at the posts on #work opportunities and rewrite yours to follow that pattern, and be specific about your geographical requirements, and I'll post it.
